languages.text: "Кажется, стоит показать силу и припугнуть эту непокорную машину".
"I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."
languages.original_text: "Кажется, стоит показать силу и припугнуть эту непокорную машину".

traits.locale_text: "I think a show of force is in order, to intimidate this machine out of getting ideas above its station."
"I think a show of force is in order, to intimidate this machine out of getting ideas above its station."
"I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."
"I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."
"I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."
"I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."

languages.text: 「この機械に立場をわからせるには、力を見せるのが理に叶っていると思うぞ」
languages.original_text: "I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."

traits.locale_text: 「この機械に立場をわからせるには、力を見せるのが理に叶っていると思うぞ」

languages.text: “我认为有必要展示武力，让这台机器明白它的地位。”
languages.original_text: "I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."

traits.locale_text: “我认为有必要展示武力，让这台机器明白它的地位。”

languages.text: « Je crois qu'une démonstration de force s'impose pour rappeler à cette machine où est sa place. »
languages.original_text: "I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."

traits.locale_text: « Je crois qu'une démonstration de force s'impose pour rappeler à cette machine où est sa place. »

languages.text: «Creo que deberíamos aplicar la fuerza para hacer entrar en razón a esta máquina».
languages.original_text: "I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que deberíamos aplicar la fuerza para hacer entrar en razón a esta máquina».

languages.text: "Ich denke, es ist eine Machtdemonstration nötig, um diese Maschine in ihre Schranken zu weisen."
languages.original_text: "I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."

traits.locale_text: "Ich denke, es ist eine Machtdemonstration nötig, um diese Maschine in ihre Schranken zu weisen."

languages.text: "Sanırım güç gösterisinde bulunup bu makineye haddini bildirme zamanı."
languages.original_text: "I think a show of force is in order, to show this machine its place."

traits.locale_text: "Sanırım bir güç gösterisinde bulunma ve bu makineye haddini bildirme zamanı."
